reviews.text: The location isn't glamorous, but then how many motels are...?
reviews.title: Good quality and good staff

reviews.text: Not new, and the exterior corridors are not ideal, but the room interior is very good, clean, & everything works well, including the wifi. The reception area has obviously been upgraded and is very smart and spacious.
reviews.title: Great Rate over Thanksgiving Travel

likes.liked: — Easy access to unload our luggage

reviews.text: Staff are excellent. Arranged a room away from the main road for me. In the evening the management lays on a nice little happy hour with free drinks and nibbles which lets the guests mingle. Nice exercise room, and a really good comprehensive breakfast offering, including eggs, sausage and gravy (and more importantly, fresh fruit, and fruit juice).
reviews.title: The Ramada Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I got a particularly good rate by walking up with a coupon from the Colorado motel coupons brochure - $60 per night.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn scores again
A decent enough hotel for the price.

likes.disliked: — Waiting to use equipment at the gym.
